body_html: I would recommend filing an issue with Bazel asking them to display a log message indicating when it's starting a dæmon, which can be shutdown with bazel shutdown. I would support that feature.

body: I would recommend filing an issue with Bazel asking them to display a log message indicating when it's starting a dæmon, which can be shutdown with bazel shutdown. I would support that feature.
